page.title: 19Farms in the area.
page.content: Walton's Farms consist of Little Walton's farm and Great Walton's farm. They grow Wheat and barley and rape.At great Walton's farm we saw a 400 year old barn which had lovely beams. An interesting feature of farms in the area is that many of the farmhouses are no longer the homes of the farmers farming the land. Farms are getting larger and many of the houses are either sold separatly from the land and lived in by people who have nothing to do with the land, or are allowed to fall into disrepair. Three Chimneys farmhouse is for example derelict. It is interesting to note that this farm got its name because each of its chimneys lies in one of three parishes.
